title: Meditation: Space and Aliveness and Awareness (2018-01-10)
itunes:title: Meditation: Space and Aliveness and Awareness
description: Meditation: Space and Aliveness and Awareness (2018-01-10) - This meditation engages the breath in a way that it connects us with our energetic aliveness and the space that holds and is intrinsic to all life. A body scan using this breath opens us to the body as a field of aliveness. We then rest in the changing flow of experience, and the still presence that is our essence.
